AppConfig._comment: The current block is: 'Anwesenheit 4. Block'. You can always view your current block here: 'https://moodle.itech-bs14.de/course/view.php?id=1570' or see example screenshot here: https://github.com/SolomonRosemite/ITECH-Auto-Attendance/blob/stable/example.png
AppConfig.__comment: The background job runs every day at 9 am.
AppConfig.___comment: If enabled, auto attendance will send you a confirmation email with logs to let you know if it was able to successfully attend or not
